full_summary:
**Request for Information**
**Title (English and French)**

* MAINTENANCE DIVING EQUIPMENT
* MAINTENANCE ÉQUIPEMENT DE PLONGÉE

**Contracting Entity Information**
The Public Works and Government Services Canada (TPSGC) is soliciting information from industry in regards to the maintenance of diving equipment.

**Tender Details**

* Tender Reference Number: W8482-182212/D
* Tender Closing Date: September 29th, 2023 at 15:00:00
* Contact Person: Nicolas Morin
* Contact Email: nicolas.morin@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Contact Phone: (819) 210-1232

**Services Required**
The contracting authority is seeking a comprehensive maintenance program for various equipment and systems related to diving operations. These include, but not limited to, equipment, systems, and supplies for gas generation, gas distribution, diving suits, and other related items.

**Procedures**
This is a Request for Information (RFI) process. All interested suppliers may submit a response with their feedback and expertise to ensure a comprehensive procurement process.

**Language of Documents**
Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada (English or French).

**Contracting Authority Reserves Right to Negotiate**
The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

**Documents**
The following attachments are available:

* [Attachment 1: Draft Statement of Work](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/08/28/4588476650000de2d8d03d4b636377b5/ABES.PROD.PW_ISM.B004.E29123.EBSU001.PDF)
* [Attachment 2: Request for Information Document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/07/14/cf7d57fcaad42d812d2a861b200bcfa9/ABES.PROD.PW_ISM.B004.E29123.EBSU000.PDF)

We anticipate reviewing and responding to all industry feedback with a comprehensive and attractive procurement process. For further information, please contact Nicolas Morin at (819) 210-1232 or nicolas.morin@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca. [End of Request for Information]  <hr/>  Rewritten Entry can be found above.
